```html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Audio player with a backgrond</title>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="media-cotainer">
        <div class="audio-player">
            <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Background Image" class="bg-image">
            <audio controls>
                <source src="audio-file.mp3" type="audio/mp3">
                Your browser does not support the audio element
            </audio>
        </div>


        <div class="video-player">
            <video autoplay muted loop>
                <source src="video-file.mp4" type="video/mp4">
            </video>
        </div>

        <div class="youtube-player">
            <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ERCMXc8x7mc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>

    </div>

    
</body>
</html>


```
